## LightModel.getTexCoordSrcLocation() method

Gets the location of a given texture coordinate index

**Signature:**

```typescript
getTexCoordSrcLocation(texCoordIndex: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  texCoordIndex | number | The texture coordinate index |

**Returns:**

number

The location of the given texture coordinate index
